name: VDODE
tagline: Brand Identity | Print and Web Design | Interactiv
description:
Imor Media Private Limited leading brand communication company offers responsive web design, branding and integrated print design solutions to the global audience.
IMOR MEDIA™ offers a wide range of services through its distinguished website VDODE. 
Our List of Design and Marketing Services:
Logo Design
Branding
Mobile Application Design (APP)
Responsive Content Management System Design
Responsive Website Design (an approach to create the best viewing experience, easy reading and quick navigation websites which work across various devices from PC to smartphones)
Print Design (Brochure, Flyers, Banners, Presentation, Marketing Collateral's, Facebook Cover Page Design)
Content Marketing
Email Marketing
Social Media Marketing
READ MORE...
